subject: Fix button placement and performance issues
body:
- Move "Update Visualization" button below the image as a standalone element instead of overlaying it
- Remove absolute positioning and update CSS for better visual hierarchy
- Fix page freeze on visualization update by removing scrollIntoView call
- Optimize DOM manipulation using classList.toggle instead of building separate arrays
- Update help documentation to reflect UI changes and improved performance
- Add responsive styling for the new button placement

Performance improvements:
- Removed automatic scrolling that competed with DOM updates
- Simplified class toggling logic reducing operations from 3 loops to 1
- Eliminates janky behavior when clicking Update Visualization
